document_data.name: Boorvald Orcbane
document_data.mainbody: '''Boorvald Orcbane''' was great chief of the [[Uthgardt]] [[Tree Ghost tribe]] around the time of the [[War of the Silver Marches]] of [[1485 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Orcbane earned his name from the raiding parties he led, which targeted settlements of the [[Iceshield]] [[orc]] clan.
document_data.Relationships: The chief had quite the prolific family. He had six sons and three daughters, all of whom were considered friends of the [[elves]] of the [[High Forest]]. These friendship were secured by gifts in the form of elven ''[[oathbow]]s'', one of which was granted to each of Boorvald's nine children.
